description:
This TV bracket is a cantilever TV bracket, and is the perfect solution to fit smaller flat screen LCD, LED and Plasma style TVs between 13 and 24 inches. This TV bracket is designed as a universal model and will fit all of the major manufacturer makes and models. It is VESA compliant, and will fit TVs that are VESA 75x75mm and 100x100mm standard mounting dimensions. Please measure your TVs VESA mounting holes, screen size and weight before purchasing to ensure proper fit.The TV bracket will swivel using a cantilever mechanism through a range of 180. The TV bracket also includes a unique tilting mechanism, which can be used to angle the TV by up to 20 - this will ensure you have the perfect viewing angle. Once you have found the perfect viewing angle, you can lock the TV bracket in place.This TV bracket is constructed from reinforced heavy gauge steel and is weight rated to 33lbs. The TV bracket is quick and easy to install and comes complete with full user manual instructions and free fitting hardware.When fitting your TV to the TV bracket, measure the distance between the mounting holes at the back to ensure they are 75mm or 100mm apart (standard VESA mounting dimensions). To ensure this TV bracket fits your TV, they must be 75mm or 100mm apart.Specifications:Supports: 13" to 24" TVs
VESA Dimensions: 75(W) x 75mm(H), 100(W) x 100mm(H)Load Capacity: 33lbsTilt Angle:-70 to +70 degree Up and DownSwivel Angle:-180 to +180 degree left and rightCantilever Arm: Extends from 50mm (flat) to 370mm at full extension
title: VonHaus by Designer Habitat Cantilever LCD Monitor TV Arm Bracket Wall Mount with Swivel and Tilt - Fits most 13" - 24" LCD Flat Panels
